answerText: Newman projections/diagrams[10] Newman projections of this molecule explain that its hydrogen atoms are staggered to maximize hyperconjugation. This two-carbon alkane has formula C2H6.
heading: ACF Regionals 2014 |2014 | Penn A-Northmont-Chicago B | 3 | Science | Chemistry | College
subject: Science
question: Question:  [10] Name these projections used in conformational analysis to show dihedral angles between adjacent groups on a carbon-carbon single bond. They are drawn as a circle with six substituents directed radially outward.
